otherNames: Super Gene, Chaoji Shen Jiyin, Chāojí Shén Jīyīn, SSS級エイリアンハンター～最底辺生物狩りから始まる成り上がり～, Super God Gene, 超级神基因
synopsis: In the epic interstellar age of the future, human beings finally conquered the space transfer technology. However, when people were transferred to the other side of the space, they found it was neither the world of the past or the future nor any of the lands under the stars...It's a mysterious world of Shelters with countless powerful monsters. Human beings ushered in a thrilling leap in evolution and started the most brilliant new era under the stars."Killing the heavenly blood black beetle can obtain its beast spirit, and eating its flesh can obtain 0-10 heavenly gene points randomly."
